title: Disconnecting Once, Sometimes Twice a Game

embed.description: Post with 1 views. Shared by flazdude. Network

body:
Hey friends, As of about a week ago I've been disconnecting just about every game. 
For the first few seconds every other champion is still moving around me, casting abilities, seemingly normal, except I'm locked in the same position fully disabled. Then I completely disconnect for about a minute before reconnecting back to the game. The disconnections happen roughly once every 15-20 minutes of in game time and also this happens when I play both game modes, but I stick to ARAM as I don't feel so bad if my game is ruined by such.
Has anyone else had this problem and found a way to fix it?
Tried doing a full repair, nothing changed. 
The internet works fine, I usually go on Reddit while I'm disconnected from game.
Also around the same time this started happening, when I alt+tab in and out of game, it takes about 5-10 seconds of a black screen before opening back up. 
Love to hear your feedback
Flaz.

replies.body: yeah ive experienced the same issue. your internet is fine but the server crashes on you. are you with telstra?
All of my mates with Telstra are getting the same problems, as well as the same disconnection at the same time :( Seems to be happening in majority of sydney
Update: it happened just right now, I died under tower at a crucial part of a losing game, then disconnected... just waiting.
having the same problem every game.. pretty frustrating

It's a routing issue from telstra servers in NSW through to riots as far as i can see.
